arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Genoa – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Stadio Diego Armando Maradona sets the stage for a ‘David vs Goliath’ Serie A showdown between Napoli and Genoa. While the visitors entered the round level on points with pacesetters Milan, the visitors remain pinned to the foot of the table amid a rough patch. The post Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Genoa – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Serie A: Napoli vs. Genoa – probable line-ups and where to watch on TV
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne might rest in Napoli’s home game against Genoa, bringing Scott McTominay back...

arts.ttl: Napoli vs. Genoa: aiming to bounce back
arts.sum: The official previous meetings between the two teams in Naples are 61: record of 29 azzurri (Napoli) wins, 22 draws and 10 Genoa victories. Napoli host Genoa looking to recover from last week’s defeat to AC Milan
